Command.Name: cmdFontFamily
Command.TooltipDescription: Change the font family.

Command.Name: cmdFontSize
Command.TooltipDescription: Change the font size.

Command.Name: cmdClearFormatting
Command.TooltipDescription: Change the selection to plain text by clearing all of the formatting.

Command.Name: cmdSubscript
Command.TooltipDescription: Create small letters below the text baseline.

Command.Name: cmdSuperscript
Command.TooltipDescription: Create small letters above the line of text.

Command.Name: cmdStrikethrough
Command.TooltipDescription: Draw a line through the middle of the selected text.

Command.Name: cmdUnderline
Command.TooltipDescription: Underline the selected text.

Command.Name: cmdItalic
Command.TooltipDescription: Italicize the selected text.

Command.Name: cmdBold
Command.TooltipDescription: Make the selected text bold.

Command.Name: cmdFontColorPicker
Command.TooltipDescription: Change the text color.

Command.Name: cmdFontBackgroundColor
Command.TooltipDescription: Make text look like it was marked with a highlighter pen.

Command.Name: cmdBullets
Command.TooltipDescription: Start a bulleted list.

Command.Name: cmdNumbers
Command.TooltipDescription: Start a numbered list.

Command.Name: cmdBlockquote
Command.TooltipDescription: Make the selected text into a block quote.

Command.Name: cmdAlignLeft
Command.TooltipDescription: Align text to the left.

Command.Name: cmdAlignRight
Command.TooltipDescription: Align text to the right.

Command.Name: cmdAlignCenter
Command.TooltipDescription: Center text.

Command.Name: cmdJustify
Command.TooltipDescription: Align text to both left and right margins, adding extra space between words as necessary.

Command.Name: cmdIndent
Command.Comment: Button to increase the indent level of the paragraph
Command.TooltipDescription: Increase the indent level of the paragraph

Command.Name: cmdOutdent
Command.Comment: Button to decrease the indent level of the paragraph
Command.TooltipDescription: Decrease the indent level of the paragraph

Command.Name: cmdRTLTextBlock
Command.TooltipDescription: Makes the direction of the selected text right-to-left.

Command.Name: cmdLTRTextBlock
Command.TooltipDescription: Makes the direction of the selected text left-to-right.

Command.Name: cmdPaste
Command.TooltipDescription: Paste the contents of the Clipboard.

Command.Name: cmdCut
Command.TooltipDescription: Cut the selection from the document and put it on the Clipboard.

Command.Name: cmdCopyCommand
Command.TooltipDescription: Copy the selection and put it on the Clipboard.

Command.Name: cmdPasteSpecial
Command.TooltipDescription: Select to paste with or without formatting.

Command.Name: cmdInsertClearBreak
Command.TooltipDescription: Insert a break after a picture to prevent text wrapping.

Command.Name: cmdInsertPictureFromFile
Command.TooltipDescription: Choose a picture from your computer to display it in this post.

Command.Name: cmdCheckSpelling
Command.TooltipDescription: Check the spelling in this post.

Command.Name: cmdWordCount
Command.TooltipDescription: Find out the number of words, characters, paragraphs, and lines.

Command.Name: cmdFindAndReplace
Command.Comment: Button to find and replace text in the post.

Command.Name: cmdSemanticHtmlGroup
Command.TooltipDescription: Use the text formatting presets determined by the blog theme.

Command.TooltipDescription: Use the text formatting presets determined by the blog theme.

Command.Name: cmdInsertHorizontalLine
Command.TooltipDescription: Insert a horizontal line.

Command.Name: cmdInsertLink
Command.TooltipDescription: Create a link to a webpage, picture, email address, or program.

Command.Name: cmdViewPlainText
Command.Comment: Command to switch to plain text view.

Command.Name: cmdAlignmentGallery
Command.TooltipDescription: Position the selected object on the page. Text is automatically set to wrap around the object.

Command.Name: cmdMarginsGroup
Command.TooltipDescription: Change the margins for the selected object.

Command.Name: cmdAdjustTopMargin
Command.TooltipDescription: Change the margin above this object.

Command.Name: cmdAdjustBottomMargin
Command.TooltipDescription: Change the margin below this object.

Command.Name: cmdAdjustLeftMargin
Command.TooltipDescription: Change the margin to the left of this object.

Command.Name: cmdAdjustRightMargin
Command.TooltipDescription: Change the margin to the right of this object.

Command.Name: cmdVideoWebPreview
Command.TooltipDescription: View this video online using a web browser.

Command.Name: cmdImageCrop
Command.TooltipDescription: Crop the picture so it only contains the current selection.

Command.Name: cmdFormatImageAdjustWidth
Command.TooltipDescription: Set the picture width.

Command.Name: cmdFormatImageAdjustHeight
Command.TooltipDescription: Set the picture height.

Command.TooltipDescription: Choose a custom size for this picture.

Command.Name: cmdSetCustomSizeDefaults
Command.TooltipDescription: Change size presets for inline pictures.

Command.TooltipDescription: Maintain the aspect ratio for this picture.

Command.Name: cmdImageRotateCW
Command.TooltipDescription: Rotate this picture to the right 90°.

Command.TooltipDescription: Rotate this picture to the left 90°.

Command.TooltipDescription: Tilt this picture left or right.

Command.TooltipDescription: Apply a border style to this picture.

Command.TooltipDescription: Add an effect to this picture.

Command.TooltipDescription: Add a blur filter to this picture.

Command.TooltipDescription: Add an emboss effect to this picture.

Command.Name: cmdImageContrast
Command.TooltipDescription: Increase or decrease the contrast in this picture.

Command.Name: cmdWatermark
Command.TooltipDescription: Add a watermark to this picture.

Command.Name: cmdFormatImageSelectLink
Command.TooltipDescription: Choose where the link goes to when this picture is clicked.

Command.Name: cmdFormatImageLinkOptions
Command.TooltipDescription: Change options for the link.

Command.Name: cmdFormatImageAltText
Command.TooltipDescription: Add a title and alternative text for this picture.

Command.Name: cmdFormatImageSaveSettings
Command.TooltipDescription: Set the alignment, margin, picture style, and properties of this picture as the default for other pictures.

Command.Name: cmdFormatImageRevertSettings
Command.TooltipDescription: Revert to the original version of this picture.

Command.Name: cmdInsertEmoticon
Command.TooltipDescription: Insert an emoticon.

Command.Name: cmdImageLinkToSource
Command.TooltipTitle: Go to the web address of the source picture when this picture is clicked.

Command.Name: cmdImageLinkToUrl
Command.TooltipTitle: Choose and enter the web address to go to when this picture is clicked.

Command.Name: cmdVideoWidescreenAspectRatio
Command.TooltipDescription: Use a widescreen aspect ratio for this video.

Command.Name: cmdVideoStandardAspectRatio
Command.TooltipDescription: Use a standard aspect ratio for this video.

Command.TooltipDescription: Access installed Writer plug-ins.

Command.TooltipDescription: Click here to open, save, print, and see what else you can do with this post.

Command.TooltipDescription: Enter a web address for a picture to display it in this post.

Command.TooltipDescription: Get more Writer plug-ins online.

Command.TooltipDescription: Change plug-in options.

Command.TooltipDescription: Select a paste option.

Command.TooltipDescription: Add a picture to this post from your computer or from online.

Command.TooltipDescription: Change options for Open Live Writer.

Command.TooltipDescription: Choose and display a location on a Bing Map in this post.

Command.Name: cmdInsertTags
Command.TooltipDescription: Insert tags for a specified tag provider.

Command.TooltipDescription: Enter a web address for a video from the web to display it in this post.

Command.TooltipDescription: Choose a video to upload it to an online service to display it in this post.

Command.TooltipDescription: Select a video from an online service to display it in this post.

Command.TooltipDescription: Insert a table in the post.

Command.Name: cmdNewPost
Command.TooltipDescription: Create a new post.

Command.Name: cmdNewPage
Command.TooltipDescription: Not supported by all blog service providers.

Command.Name: cmdSavePost
Command.LabelDescription: Save a local draft of this post.
Command.TooltipDescription: Save a local draft of this post.

Command.Name: cmdPostAsDraft
Command.LabelDescription: Send the current post to your blog as a draft that is not viewable by the public.
Command.TooltipDescription: Send the current post to your blog as a draft.

Command.Name: cmdPostAsDraftAndEditOnline
Command.LabelDescription: Send the post to your blog as a draft that is not viewable by the public and open a web browser to edit the draft online.
Command.TooltipDescription: Send the current post to your blog as a draft and edit online.

Command.Name: cmdPrint
Command.TooltipDescription: Print this post.

Command.Name: cmdPrintPreview
Command.TooltipDescription: Preview this post.

Command.Name: cmdPostAndPublish
Command.LabelDescription: Publish this post to the selected blog.
Command.TooltipDescription: Publish this post to your blog.

Command.TooltipDescription: Open a draft or recently published post.

Command.TooltipDescription: Get help on using Open Live Writer.

Command.TooltipDescription: Open a local draft

Command.TooltipDescription: Open a recently published post

Command.TooltipDescription: Change options for this blog account.
